original_title: Oigyeingwa kongkong gangshi - 외계인 과 콩콩 강시
overview: A UFO arrives on Earth and re-animates corpses in a cemetery. One of the zombies, a little girl who died during a kidnap attempt, orders the zombies to destroy her murderers before they can harm another child. This must be accomplished before it is time for her to leave in the spacecraft.
title: The Aliens and Kong Kong Zombie
